entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 3:51 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -35.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.8°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
